definitions.text: a feeling of being intimate and belonging together
examples: their closeness grew as the night wore on

definitions.text: the quality of being close and poorly ventilated
the spatial property resulting from a relatively small distance
examples: the sudden closeness of the dock sent him into action

definitions.text: characterized by a lack of openness (especially about one's actions or purposes)

examples: the absence of fences created a mysterious intimacy in which no one knew privacy
